content:
Documents reviewed:

[1]. Approved methodology ACM0002 ver. 09 — “Consolidated methodology for grid-connected electricity generation from renewable sources”

[2]. Validation and Verification Standard Version 02.0 issued on 25/11/2011

[3]. VCS Standard Version 3.3 effective as the 01/05/2012

[4]. Registered CDM-PDD version 3.5 dated 23/12/2009, CDM Ref No. 3325

[5]. VCS-PD Version 01, dated 28/02/2012

[6]. VCS-PD Version 02, dated 20/08/2012

[7]. VCS-MR Version 01, dated 28/02/2012

[8]. VCS-MR Version 02, dated 20/08/2012

[9]. CDM Validation Report Version 01, dated 20/01/2010;

[10]. Business License of the PP

[11]. LoA of the Project (No.812) issued by National Development and Reform Commission of P.R.China in Jan.2008

http://cdm.unfccc.int/UserManagement/FileStorage/H6GEPAJMCVUKO17LI90XSSQD8NY2R4

[12]. Signed Power Purchase Agreements (PPAs) between the PP and the grid company

[13]. Implementation log of the Project

[14]. Diagram of power system connection and monitoring points of the Project

[15]. Wind turbine generators purchase contract

[16]. Monitoring & Management Manual

[17]. Monitoring internal Training records

[18]. Calibration Certificates of all the meters
